samples.context: Many items can be reused many times. For example; old newspaper can be used for packing many items.
samples.question: What can old newspapers be used for?

samples.context: Old envelopes can be used for doing rough work while doing your homework.
samples.question: How can old envelopes be reused?

samples.context: Old plastic bottles can be used for many other purposes.
samples.question: What can old plastic bottles be repurposed for?

samples.context: Many items like newspaper and plastic bottles can be reused repeatedly.
samples.question: Which items can be reused many times?

samples.context: Reuse practices include using old newspapers and envelopes for different tasks.
samples.question: What are some examples of reuse practices?
